posts.title: ChatGPT-11-format
posts.text: ChatGPT å¯ä»¥ç”Ÿæˆçš„ 11 ç§å¼ºå¤§çš„è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼1. GraphExample Prompt:Create a line graph showing the Google search trends for a particular AI over the past year. 2. ChecklistExample Prompt:Create a checklist for preparing for a job interview. 3. ScorecardExample Prompt:Can you generate output in a scorecard format on how apple stocks performed against tesla in past 5 years. 4. JSONExample Prompt:Can you provide details of the last 2 FIFA world cup winners in JSON format? I want the following to include a date, opponent name, winner name, score, and stadium name. 5. ChartExample Prompt:Johnny made $50k sale in Jan, $40K in Feb and $30k in March. Shaun made $60k sale in Jan, $20K in Feb and $75k in March. Can you put this data in a bar chart? 6. TableExample Prompt:Can you provide details of the last 2 FIFA world cup winners in JSON format? I want the following to include a date, opponent name, winner name, score, and stadium name. 7. CodeExample Prompt:Write { Code you want to generate } in { programming language } 8. CSVExample Prompt:Can you provide details of the last 2 ICC cricket world cup winners in CSV format? I want the following to be included in it a date, opponent name, winner name, score, stadium name. 9. XML/ YAMLExample Prompt:Give me data on the USA population for the years 2012 and 2013. I want the total count with males and females breakdown in XML and YAML format. 10. SVGExample Prompt:Create SVG of a smiling face. 11. DiagramsExample Prompt:Can you provide me with a diagram of the solar system? Ref11 Powerful output formats ChatGPT can produce ( with examples ) ğŸ§µ:(https://twitter.com/MakadiaHarsh/status/1634215629225070593?t=cZcV6HpNO7UdUH_ycEWL_g&s=03)

posts.title: ffmpeg-help
posts.text: ffmpegä½¿ç”¨è§†é¢‘æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢è§†é¢‘è½¬æˆ16:9æ ¼å¼ 1ffmpeg -i "5.avi" -vcodec libx264 -crf 23 -vf "scale=w=trunc(ih*dar/2)*2:h=trunc(ih/2)*2, setsar=1/1, scale=w=1920:h=1080:force_original_aspect_ratio=1, pad=w=1920:h=1080:x=(ow-iw)/2:y=(oh-ih)/2:color=#000000" "output.mp4" 1ffmpeg -i "Chap-GPT-01.mp4" -vcodec libx264 -crf 23 -vf "scale=w=trunc(ih*dar/2)*2:h=trunc(ih/2)*2, setsar=1/1, scale=w=1080:h=1920:force_original_aspect_ratio=1, pad=w=1080:h=1920:x=(ow-iw)/2:y=(oh-ih)/2:color=#000000" "output.mp4"

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
